data.comment: Emmanuel Agbadou scores with a header and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 35, Stef Peeters instrumental with a fine assist.
Beerschot's Ayrton Mboko has been booked in Antwerp.
Yan Vorogovskiy (Beerschot) has received a yellow card from Jonathan Lardot.
In the minute 45, Jonathan Lardot blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Olympisch Stadion.
Pierre Bourdin is replacing Yan Vorogovskiy for Beerschot at Olympisch Stadion.
In the minute 54, Julien Ngoy (Eupen) has received a first yellow card.
Nils Schouterden for Eupen has been booked by Jonathan Lardot and receives a first yellow card.
Hernan Losada is making the team's second substitution at Olympisch Stadion with Abdoulie Sanyang replacing Ryan Sanusi.
In the minute 77, Menno Koch is replacing Amara Baby for the away team.
The home team have replaced Ayrton Mboko with Blessing Eleke. This is the third substitution made today by Hernan Losada.
Pierre Bourdin (Beerschot) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 88, The away team replace Julien Ngoy with Andreas Beck.
Eupen make their third substitution with Mamadou Kone replacing Konan N'Dri.
The match has come to a close in Antwerp. The final score is 0-1.
